author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2108: Fixed transacted routes mixed with Camel error handling doing redelivery from the beginning of the route and not only at the failed node in the route path. RedeliveryErrorHandler is now part of TransactionalErrorHandler hence the isTransacted check should be removed.

author: brett
msg: don't generate the site - causes problems with the version not being installed and we don't need it on the RCs anyway.
